attributes.title: Web Development Fundamentals
attributes.description: Learn the basics of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

attributes.title: Responsive Web Design
attributes.description: Learn how to create websites that look great on all devices, from desktops to smartphones.

attributes.title: JavaScript for Web Developers
attributes.description: Learn how to use JavaScript to create interactive web applications.

attributes.title: Web Development with Node.js
attributes.description: Learn how to use Node.js to build scalable web applications.

attributes.title: Advanced Web Development Techniques
attributes.description: Take your web development skills to the next level with advanced techniques and best practices.
